text: Jason R. Reitman (; born October 19, 1977) is a Canadianâ€“American filmmaker. He is best known for directing the movies Thank You for Smoking (2005), Juno (2007), Up in the Air (2009), Young Adult (2011), Ghostbusters: Afterlife (2021), and Saturday Night (2024). He was nominated for a Grammy Award, one Golden Globe and four Academy Award. He is the son of director Ivan Reitman. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Interview with Jason Reitman about Juno at the Telluride Film Festival, September 10, 2007 * Interview with Jason Reitman about Thank You for Smoking and JunoEyeForFilm.co.uk * Ubben Lecture at DePauw University; March 15, 2010 (includes video clips) * Jason Reitman's Guest DJ Set on KCRW Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Canadian movie producers Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Canadian movie actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Montreal Category:Writers from Montreal Category:American child actors Category:Canadian child actors
title: Jason Reitman
